name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"a6de0013-bfb1-4b0a-b08c-cd91559e9be0","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: decode_node","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1dfa7de9-a824-4d1d-bfa5-653b2fe669dd","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"decode_node","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function is a versatile translation utility that converts raw Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) nodes into the analyzer's internal ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Definition","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" objects or literal representations. It acts as a bridge between the syntactic structure of the code and the semantic model, identifying exactly what a piece of code (like a variable name, a function call, or a list literal) refers to within the current analysis context.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"936038d1-005f-45ec-9130-0870385cf9f5","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why this matters
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"AST nodes are purely structural; they tell you that a "Name" node exists, but not what that name ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"means","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":". ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"decode_node","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" provides that meaning.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"186a6bbb-f15c-48de-aa2c-d6dc4b29a8cc","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Uniformity:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It ensures that whether the code uses a variable, a literal string, or a complex attribute access like ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"obj.attr","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", the rest of the analyzer receives a consistent list of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Definition","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" objects to work with.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a8c72c73-a225-458b-9050-0e29a773c482","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Type Discovery:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It automatically maps Python literals (numbers, strings, lists) to internal type tags like ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"<int>","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"<str>","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", which is essential for type-inference and data-flow tracking.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9d1947fb-2add-4187-a91b-9e39198591ea","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Forward Linking:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" When it encounters a call (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"func()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), it automatically identifies the return target (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"func.<return>","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), allowing the analyzer to track the output of the function.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b9ab0f10-7d96-41d4-ad80-42a41f6d0e52","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How it works
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The function uses a series of conditional checks to handle different AST node types:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"cf0aa58f-eb3d-4c6a-b33a-cae81fe4305a","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Names (","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"ast.Name","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"):","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Looks up the identifier in the current scope to find its active definition.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"373e4d81-6ab8-45c5-93fd-a3a8ceefd602","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Calls (","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"ast.Call","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"):","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Decodes the function being called and returns the definition associated with that function's return value (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"<return>","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"01c04fbc-47e6-498f-ace2-e18f2abf5273","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Attributes (","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"ast.Attribute","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"):","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Resolves the base object and looks up the specific attribute on it, creating a placeholder (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"NA_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") if the attribute isn't found.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c38e99e2-8c8a-4f14-828d-f2c2230b13a6","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Literals:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Maps numbers, strings, and f-strings to global type definitions (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"<int>","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"<str>","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"71f62cac-0335-423d-9729-c563ccd14c64","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Collections:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" For Lists and Dicts, it retrieves the unique definition generated during the visitation phase (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"<list_1>","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"90a4729d-c2e6-42cb-b956-8309a0177bbe","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Tuples:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Recursively decodes each element, returning a structured list of definitions.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d085415f-1ce3-4e51-999f-e1227d73550d","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Subscripts:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Resolves the container and the key/index to determine which specific definition is being accessed.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a1537572-f749-4e72-8c7f-c17dd9f9b62c","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Example Scenario
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"If the analyzer processes the expression ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"user.name","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":":","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ae0a4255-56eb-41ba-a181-17637440fc13","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"decode_node","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" sees an ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Attribute","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" node.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8070d4a5-e62d-4ef2-8784-274119726706","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It recursively calls ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"decode_node","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" on ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"user","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f837c2bb-ca0b-485f-840b-179f08912932","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"user","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is resolved to a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Definition","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" object for a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"User","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" instance.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"90e49d53-2dbc-4bc3-9057-6a948e4a143b","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It then joins the instance namespace with ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"name","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"module.User.name","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"56a14a0f-5e5a-4a94-ae76-244d4516046c","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It returns the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Definition","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" object for that specific attribute.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d1b6e0b3-8130-468a-99f8-1b905511821a","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
